member.summary: Returns an enumerable collection of array of bounding boxes of human faces in a image using the cnn face detector.
member.param: An enumerable collection of images.
The number of image looking for faces. Higher numbers find smaller faces.
The number of images to include in each GPU processing batch.
member.returns: An enumerable collection of array of found face locations.

member.name: M:FaceRecognitionDotNet.FaceRecognition.CompareFace(FaceRecognitionDotNet.FaceEncoding,FaceRecognitionDotNet.FaceEncoding,System.Double)
member.summary: Compare a known face encoding against a candidate encoding to see if they match.
member.param: A known face encodings.
A single face encoding to compare against a known face encoding.
The distance between faces to consider it a match. Lower is more strict. The default value is 0.6.
member.returns: A True/False value indicating which known a face encoding matches the face encoding to check.

member.name: M:FaceRecognitionDotNet.FaceRecognition.CompareFaces(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{FaceRecognitionDotNet.FaceEncoding},FaceRecognitionDotNet.FaceEncoding,System.Double)
member.summary: Compare an enumerable collection of face encodings against a candidate encoding to see if they match.
member.param: An enumerable collection of known face encodings.
A single face encoding to compare against the enumerable collection.
The distance between faces to consider it a match. Lower is more strict. The default value is 0.6.
member.returns: An enumerable collection of True/False values indicating which known face encodings match the face encoding to check.
member.exception: is disposed. Or contains disposed object.
